body.name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Foaming Oil-Free Facial Cleanser with Soy Extract & 0.5% Salicylic Acid, Acne Treatment Face Wash for Acne-Prone Skin, Sulfate-Free & Hypoallergenic, 6 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 22 mins
features: 6-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Clear Complexion Oil-Free Foaming Daily Acne Facial Cleanser to help prevent breakouts and improve complexion while cleansing breakout-prone skin

Aveeno Positively Radiant with soy extract, gently improves skin tone and texture. The facial cleanser is formulated with 0.5% salicylic acid acne treatment medication to help clear up breakouts and acne

The hypoallergenic daily face wash is non-comedogenic and has been formulated to remove pore-clogging impurities from the skin. Its gentle formula is made free of sulfates, oils, soaps, parabens and dyes to reveal healthy-looking skin

Leaves skin looking soft, smooth, and even-looking and complements a routine for acne prone skin. Foaming salicylic acid cleanser is from Aveeno, which has been dermatologist recommended for over 70 years

Aveeno Positively Radiant Clear Complexion Foaming Cleanser for acne-prone skin gently cleanses uneven, dull skin to leave it feeling soft and smooth, making it the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine
body.description: The Aveeno Clear Complexion Foaming Daily Facial Cleanser helps prevent breakouts and visibly improves skin tone and texture. This acne face wash washes away dirt, oil, and bacteria to improve the look of dull skin and leave skin feeling soft, smooth and even-looking. Ideal for breakout-prone skin, it contains 0.5% salicylic acid acne medication, which treats and clears up blemishes, revealing healthy-looking skin. The mild formula with soy extracts is free of sulfates, oils, soaps, parabens and dyes. The face wash has been formulated to remove pore-clogging impurities and is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, and gentle enough for everyday use. Aveeno Positively Radiant with soy extract, gently improves skin tone and texture revealing brighter, more radiant skin. Aveeno has been dermatologist recommended for over 70 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin looks and feels great
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cleanser. My skin looks and and feels refreshed after using. No sticky residue or leftover makeup/dirt. No sensitivity or scent to leave discomfort or dryness. First time buyer but definitely not the last time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t beat aveeno for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have used aveeno face cleansers since 1980, ( I used to work for a dermatologist and he always recommended Aveenobar soap for all kinds of skin irritations) as I have very sensitive skin and even now in my golden years I still get the occasional zit. Benzoyl peroxide is too drying and irritating for me, but salicylic acid always does the trick, and aveeno foaming face wash containing salicylic acid keeps the breakouts at bay without drying or irritating my skin. I love the foaming cleanser because it cleans wonderfully, even removes makeup well, and a little goes along way. My skin doesn’t feel dry or tight afterward. I don’t like all of the aveeno products,( don’t like their moisturizers) but I love this cleanser!
